favourite.article: Keep capturing us Lord! Never let me win!
Praise the Lord. He is our true Beloved. I love You Lord.
Come and fill me Lord to the brim. Overflow in me. Overcome in me.

I just love the prayer in this hymn. Come and fill me, my Beloved, my Lord, to the brim! Oh, not just my spirit but even the smallest corner of my heart. Overflow and overcome in me, Lord! I want to be Your expression here in the church. Just open my heart wider to You!
O Lord! Thou art my Beloved. My most lovely Beloved. Lord, I just love You.
Thou art my Beloved, The most lovely Beloved I love UUUUUUU Lord!
Amen... Lord I belong to Thee, capture me... NEVER let me win!!! Oh Lord Jesus!

"Thou art my Beloved...My heart I open wide to Thee...Come now! Fill me!...Fill up this vessel! I belong to Thee!...Come and fill me...to the brim!...Even me! Capture me, never let me win!...Overflow in me! Overcome in me!"
Love this hymn. Come and fill me Lord to the brim! never let me win!
Yes, come now and fill me, Lord!
Praise the Lord!! Yes, Lord, even me! Never let me win! Overcome in me.
